Text: Uh, I was actually just carrying out an investigation on this island into cult activity. Any leads?
Cult activity? In Clapton? Is this what our government spending is coming to?
We could hardly organize a [___], let alone a bloody cult!
You'd be better off taking a look at the monster infestation in that crevice outside our store, folks are utterly stranded on either side!
Terrible for business, I must say...
